## oneOf variable

待检值是否存在于检测数组中

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
oneOf: (target: BasicType, targetArr?: BasicType[] | undefined) => boolean
```

## Example

oneOf('a', \['a', 'b', 'c'\])
